programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.desc: Bubble Bass teams up with Dirty Bubble in 'The Dirty Bubble Bass', then in 'Sheldon SquarePants', SpongeBob's parents adopt Plankton! (S14, ep 12)

programme.desc: Squidward finds an unexpected pest at his hotel in 'Jolly Lodgers', then in 'Biddy Sitting', SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick dig a tunnel between their two houses and drive Squidward nuts in 'That Sinking Feeling', and then in 'Karate Star', Patrick learns just enough karate to wreak havoc!

programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance in 'Pearl Wants to Be a Star', then in 'Super Sitters', Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new. (S1, ep 12)

programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn canfod ei bod yn hwyl i liwio pethau'r lliwiau anghywir. The Colourblocks discover that it can be fun to colour things the wrong colour.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur efo ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon cawn ddysgu mwy am Chwilen y Dom a'r Anaconda. In this programme we learn about the Dung beetle and the Anaconda.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Benja fynd ar goll, mae Guto a Lili yn rhoi map iddo i'w helpu i ddod o hyd i'w ffordd adre. After Benja gets lost in the woods, Guto and Lili give him a map to find his way home.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a phan nad yw'n gallu penderfynu pa esgidiau i'w gwisgo, mae'r anifeiliaid yn trio helpu! Pablo can't decide which shoes to wear!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am awyrennau yn y bennod yma, a phwy wnaeth ddyfeisio ac adeiladu'r awyren gyntaf. We'll learn about Aeroplanes in this episode, and about who invented the first one.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Yn antur heddiw, mae Mabli a'i ffrindiau'n mwynhau rhyfeddod gaeafol Pentre Papur Pop! Can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snow storm arrives?

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae caws yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd â hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddi. Today, Nel wants to know where cheese comes from.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Pa gartrefi allwn ni sylwi arnynt yn y parc? Mae malwod yn cario eu cartrefi ar eu cefnau, ac adar yn gallu byw mewn tai adar. What world-of-nature homes can we see in the park?

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Dim ond un waith pob 80 o flynyddoedd mae'r Seren Gynffon Sebra yn ymddangos yn yr awyr, felly mae'n rhaid trefnu parti i ddathlu'r digwyddiad. Stiw celebrates the Zebra Comet in the sky!

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Cyw a Jangl yn gwersylla yn y jwngl ond maen nhw ar lwgu! Cyw and Jangl are camping in the jungle but are starving! Jen and Jim help them cook something tasty to eat.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Dyfri eisiau ymarfer chwarae'r gêm 'Madfall Wedi Fflio' cyn y carnifal. Dyfri wants to practice playing the 'Flying Newts' game before the carnival.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweld â Bywyd Gwyllt Glaslyn, mynd am dro i Gastell Dryslwyn, a hwyl mewn Ysgol Goedwig ger Caerfyrddin. Join Meleri and Huw as they go on all sorts of open air adventures.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân llawn egni i helpu plant ddysgu am rannau o'r corff. An energetic song that will help children learn about parts of their body.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae yna syrpreis yn disgwyl Twm Twrch. Mae pawb yng Nghwmtwrch wedi dod ynghyd i ddiolch iddo ac i roi allwedd y dref iddo. Today, there is a surprise in store for Twm Twrch.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar ôl cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn gwirfoddoli i warchod Pwti - ond mae'n darganfod nad yw gwarchod plant mor hawdd ag y mae'n edrych. Crawc volunteers to babysit Pwti, but it isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Pry Bach Tew'n benderfynol o ennill y gystadleuaeth Hetiau Pasg, hyd yn oed drwy dwyll! Pry Bach is determined to win an Easter Bonnet competition by fair means or foul, but does he?

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Llywela Llygoden wedi cael ffôn newydd a'n mynd ati gyda'i ffrind Llywelyn i dynnu lluniau o'u ffrindiau. Llywela Mouse has just got a brand new phone and sets off to have fun with it!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae hipos Carlos yn dymchwel y syrcas. Dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Toad yn comisiynu darlun o'i hun gan Mrs Dyfrgi ond ni all aros ddigon llonydd iddi ei baentio. Toad commissions a portrait of himself, but can't keep still for her to paint him.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Ymunwch gyda Tref y ci, Elin a Berian wrth iddynt edrych ar ôl pob math o anifeiliaid gyda help eu ffrindiau ifanc. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Come join us!

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Brethyn bron â drysu wrth i Fflwff dynnu rol cyfan o rhuban oddi ar ei ril. O-na! Fluff runs rings around Tweedy as he pulls an entire roll of ribbon off a reel. Uh-oh!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Pan mae Twm Twrch yn sylweddoli ei fod yn gorfod bod mewn tri lle ar yr un pryd, mae Llyfryn yn ei helpu drwy greu tri ohono. Twm Twrch realises he has to be in three places at once, uh-oh!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Beth yw llosgfynydd?' yw cwestiwn Gweni heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl am Pegi'r Pengwin oedd eisiau bod yn gogydd byd-enwog! Gweni asks 'What is a volcano?' and Grandpa spins a tale.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Ma Jetboi a Jetferch yn anghytuno, ond pan fydd Lili Lafant yn hypnoteiddio dinasyddion i'w ufuddhau hi ma'r gwahaniaethau'n troi'n gryfder. Lily Lafant hypnotizes citizens into obeying her.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Heno

programme.title: Sali Mali

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau

programme.title: Twm Twrch

programme.desc: Bydd Harri Parri'n darganfod rhai o straeon trafnidiaeth Pen Llyn. Harri Parri relives his travels in an old Austin Seven and roams Pen Llyn to discover the area's transport history.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Olobobs

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Toad yn cael gwared ar hen gadair esmwyth, mae'n difaru ar unwaith. The Weasels have claimed Toad's old chair - can he get it back?

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar ôl cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae sianeli teledu Ocido wedi drysu'n lân ac mae'n rhaid i Blero a'i ffrindiau ddatrys y broblem. All Ocido's television channels are completely mixed up and Blero has to fix the problem.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Deian a Loli heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Deian and Loli's world today?

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae meddwl Mwmintrol yn dechrau chwarae triciau arno pan yn aros gartre ar ben ei hun dros nos am y tro cynta. Moomintrol's worst fears come true as he sees nightmarish creature, The Ghost!

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda'r band Poer Poeth, Teulu'r Oddams a Bari Bargen. Join Cadi, Luke, Jed and Miriam in the comedy series Chwarter Call.

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Tra bod y merched yn cefnogi Stephanie maen 'nhw'n gweld bod na chwaraewyr yn twyllo! Stephanie's competitive side gives the girls a front row seat to a cheating scandal.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Yn yr ail bennod o'r gyfres cawn wybod mwy am gewri tawel ein byd, sef coed, a pham ei fod mor bwysig ein bod yn eu gwarchod. We learn about the silent giants of our world - trees.

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Lloyd sy'n ymuno â sesiwn ymarfer tîm hoci Cymru, sgiliau hoci ia gyda thîm Paralympaidd y Cardiff Huskies, profi oerfel siambr cryotherapy a chriw hoci Pwllheli yw'r Sgwad. Today: hockey.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Miss Enfys am roi ei gwers ioga cyntaf i Gari Gofalwr ond mae'r sesiwn yn mynd yn anniben tu hwnt! Miss Enfys attempts to teach yoga to Gari Gofalwr but the session turns into chaos! [SL]

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Yr olaf o'r gyfres: bydd y tîm yn creu trefniant i ddathlu 20ml o elusen Prostate Cymru. Last in the series: the team create a display to celebrate 20 years of the Prostate Cymru charity. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Lowrie, cyn-athrawes gynradd, sydd yn y stiwdio heddiw ac mae angen help Cadi ac Owain arni i ffeindio gwisg addas ar gyfer siarad gydag elusen sy'n agos iawn at ei chalon. Styling show. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a'r Gelli Gandryll sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This time, join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Hay on Wye has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Mae'r pobyddion sy'n weddill yn creu cacennau arallfydol fel rhan o'u hymdrech i aros yn yr Academi. Four starry eyed bakers create out-of-this-world cakes in the series semi final. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar nofio awyr agored yng nghwmni Lisa Jên. This week, Scott gives a helping hand at an animal park, and joins in a Taiko drumming session. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Ar Sgwrs Dan y Lloer gynta'r gyfres, cawn ymweld â gardd a chartref yr actores, Bethan Ellis Owen. In the latest series of Sgwrs Dan y Lloer, Elin Fflur chats with actress Bethan Elis Owen. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Mae Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts ar siwrna Scandi, yn profi a'n coginio'r gorau o fwydydd Norwy. Welsh fire chef Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts starts his epic Scandi food journey in Norway. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Tro hwn, awn ar daith i Ddolaucothi, Pumsaint; o Lanrug i Lanberis; i Abertawe; ac i bentre Corris. Gareth, Moli, Ffion & Gareth take us to Pumsaint, Llanrug-Llanberis, Swansea & Corris. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Plant Ni
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf, cawn gipolwg tu ôl i'r llenni ar un o Wardiau Plant prysuraf Gogledd Cymru, yn Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. A behind the scenes look at the busy Children's Ward at Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno â thîm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy. [SL]

programme.title: Black Tuesday
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by Hugo Fregonese. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Jean Parker & Peter Graves. A death row inmate breaks free on the eve of his execution, but will the law catch up with him?

programme.title: Too Young To Love
programme.desc: 1959. Directed by Muriel Box. Stars Jess Conrad, Pauline Hahn, Joan Miller & Austin Willis. Based on the play, Pickup Girl by Elsa Shelley. A story of a young girl's lapse into sex delinquency. [S]

programme.title: Road to Bali
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Directed by Hal Walker. Stars Bing Crosby, Bob Hope & Dorothy Lamour. Two vaudeville performers accept diving work in Bali and find treasure, love and trouble along the way. [S]

programme.title: Four Star Playhouse: Trail's End
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Robert Florey. Stars Dick Powell, Lee Van Cleef & Richard Hale. A famous marshal of Dodge City sets out in search of the murderous Sonoma Kid and stumbles upon a tragedy. [S]

programme.title: Melody Club
programme.desc: 1949. Comedy. A nitwit investigator (Terry Thomas) goes undercover in a restaurant to catch a gang of crooks. [S]

programme.title: Sounds for Silents
programme.desc: A captivating reel about how music was created for silent films.

programme.title: Snowball
programme.desc: 1960. Crime. Directed by Pat Jackson. Stars Gordon Jackson, Kenneth Griffith, Zena Walker and Dennis Waterman. After forgetting his ticket, a devious young boy causes trouble for the conductor. [S]

programme.title: The Night We Dropped a Clanger
programme.desc: 1959. A Wing Commander (Brian Rix) is on a mission to find out about the flying bomb. Stars William Hartnell, Leslie Phillips, Leo Franklyn & Liz Fraser. [S]

programme.title: Shepherd On The Rock
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Directed by Bob Keen. Starring Bernard Hill, John Bowles and Betsy Brantley. A sheep farmer and his family fight for their land against the persistent efforts of a land developer. [S]

programme.title: The Great Milk Bottle Mystery
programme.desc: 1950s short film made by the British Milk association on the loss of 6.4 million milk bottles a week. It's time to do your bit before the coal runs out. Can you help Mrs Jones of 22 Acacia Grove?

programme.title: Murder In Reverse
programme.desc: 1945. Crime. Director: Montgomery Tully. Stars William Hartnell, Jimmy Hanley & Chili Bouchier. After a long imprisonment, a man wrongfully framed for murder hunts for the truth and the killer. [S]

programme.title: The Writing on the Wall
programme.desc: Mike Read travels across Britain to find the intriguing Blue Plaques around the country, and the stories behind them. This episode features the Titanic, Windrush, Buddy Holly and Elvis Presley. [S]

programme.title: Nowhere To Go
programme.desc: 1958. Crime. Directors: Seth Holt, Basil Dearden. Stars George Nader, Maggie Smith, Bernard Lee. Paul Gregory is released from jail, following a stretch for robbing a woman who falls for his charms.

programme.title: Four Star Playhouse: Tusitala
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars David Niven, Gertrude Michael & John Lupton. Nearing the end of his life, Robert Louis Stevenson mediates between two Samoan tribes to prevent war. [S]

programme.title: You're Only Young Twice
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Stars Duncan Macrae, Joseph Tomelty, Charles Hawtrey, Ronnie Corbett, Patrick Barr. A new Lord Rector arrives at Skerryvore University that turns out to be an attractive young woman. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1962. The Square Mile Murder. Directed by Allan Davis. Starring John Welsh, Delphi Lawrence and Stanley Morgan. When a travel agency is burgled Supt. Hicks is brought in to solve the case. (S1, E39)

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: The Jim Twins/Flitwick Ghost. 1995. Michael Aspel examines two unusual cases, including a look at the fascinating story of the Jim Twins and a look at the ghost who haunts Flitwick Manor. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for a strange and mysterious night. First up, is another superb episode of Doomwatch called Flight into Yesterday, about the odd aftereffects of long haul flights. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: Flight into Yesterday. 1971. Stars John Paul & Desmond Llewelyn. After a long-haul flight Dr Quist's reputation is put in doubt when he arrives drunk to a meeting with the Prime Minister. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A groundskeeper causes all sorts of trouble in a remote country estate in The Nightcomers. Caroline Munro introduces the 1971 British horror starring Marlon Brando and Stephanie Beacham. [S]

programme.title: The Nightcomers
programme.desc: 1971. Horror. Directed by Michael Winner. Stars Stephanie Beacham, Marlon Brando & Thora Hird. A groundskeeper of a country estate corrupts a virtuous governess and the children she looks after. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Next week, there will be more investigations and a cold, evil presence - keep watching to find out why, as Caroline Munro introduces the upcoming features. [S]

programme.title: They Live
programme.desc: 1988. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John Carpenter. Stars Roddy Piper, Keith David & Meg Foster. A homeless drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses capable of showing the world the way it truly is. [S]

programme.title: They Live
programme.desc: 1988. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John Carpenter. Stars Roddy Piper, Keith David & Meg Foster. A homeless drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses capable of showing the world the way it truly is. [S]

programme.title: Woman On The Run
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by Norman Foster. Stars Ann Sheridan, Dennis O'Keefe & Robert Keith. An eyewitness to a murder is pursued by his wife, the police and the killer around San Francisco. [S]

programme.title: Time Warp
programme.desc: 1981. Sci-Fi. While seeking a cosmic black hole, an astronaut discovers a time warp. Stars Adam West and Gretchen Corbett. Written By Anne Spielberg. Directed by: Robert Emenegger and Allan Sandler.

programme.title: The Stolen Jools
programme.desc: 1931. Comedy. Director William McGann & Victor Heerman. Stars Norma Shearer, Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Buster Keaton & Edward G. Robinson. A police inspector searches Hollywood for stolen pearls. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Wind Up Week. 1964. Narrated by Richard Greene. It's 1938. The barriers in Austria are raised to allow German troops in, the Japanese crush the Chinese and the war in Spain draws to a close. [S]

programme.title: The Price of Silence
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: Montgomery Tully. Stars Gordon Jackson, June Thorburn & Mary Clare. Roger forges a new life for himself after his release from prison. But his past catches up with him. [S]

programme.title: Kitchen Magic
programme.desc: 1963. Directed by Dennis Shand. A gas council advert film with Fanny and Johnnie Cradock demonstrating some 1960s cookery.

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. End of the Line. Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Robot Revolution. 1963. Stars Ronnie Stevens, Libby Morris & Murray Kash. When an eruption at the Atlantic Sea Farm damages robot workers, Space Headquarters becomes overrun by the machines. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Yegg Foes in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Gail Hire. The city's ownership has reverted to Egghead, who fires all city officials and opens the metropolis to the underworld. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Pirate King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Martin Benson & Trader Faulkner. Richard's skill at chess and duelling is put to the test when he is challenged by the infamous pirate Forked Beard. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Rescue. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. On its maiden flight, Supercar, piloted by Mike Mercury, is sent to rescue brothers Bill and Jimmy Gibson who are adrift at sea. [S]

programme.title: The Dog and the Diamonds
programme.desc: 1953. Family. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Kathleen Harrison & George Coulouris. A group of children create their own zoo in the garden of a disused house - which is also a hideout for thieves. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Reluctant Rebel. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Leslie Phillips & John Carson. Sir Geoffrey and his servant disguise themselves as outlaws and join Robin's gang to get some insight for a journal. [S]

programme.title: Atomic Rulers
programme.desc: 1965. Sci-fi. Directed by Koreyoshi Akasaka, Teruo Ishii & Akira Mitsuwa. Stars Ken Utsui & Sachihiro Ohsawa. Starman is sent to Earth after learning of a devastating plot to destroy the planet. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Dead Part of the House.1959. Starring Philip Abbott, Joanne Linville and Mimi Gibson. After the death of her mother, a young girl makes friends with three mysterious dolls in the nursery... [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Mystery of the TA2. 1963. Stars Paul Maxwell & John Bluthal. The crew find the wreck of a rocket that exploded 50 years ago. Assuming the pilot is alive, the team travel to an icy planet to find him.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Renegade Rocket. 1968. Stars Cy Grant, Donald Gray & Paul Maxwell. When the Mysterons gain control of a rocket, Captains Scarlet and Blue must find a way to stop it before it reaches its target.

programme.title: Night Train for Inverness
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Ernest Morris. Stars Norman Wooland & Jane Hylton. An ex-convict kidnaps his son and takes him on a train to Inverness, unaware he is putting his son's life in danger. [S]

programme.title: The Long Arm
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Charles Frend. Stars Jack Hawkins, John Stratton, Dorothy Alison & Michael Brooke. The sleuths of Scotland Yard try to solve a series of burglaries. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Plumbing the Depths
programme.desc: 1962. A insightful study of nautical charts and the men who make them, and their history, with a look at the part played by HMS Vidal in the surveying.

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Hunch. 1976. Stars Shirley Allen & Hetty Baynes. When a girl goes missing, door-to-door inquiries lead nowhere, but Haggar has a lead on stolen cameras, taking the case in an unexpected direction. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: One of Ours. Creator: John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. David's bombing raid goes horribly awry on the return to Britain. Fred confronts Sheila over her relationship with Bob. [S]

programme.title: An Affair in Mind
programme.desc: 1988. Crime Drama. Directed by Colin Luke. Stars Amanda Donohoe, Stephen Dillane & Hilary Mason. A young novelist falls for a married woman, who then wants him to kill her husband. [S]

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Min Flies Solo: When Maggie the pterosaur hurts her wing, Min needs to copy Jon and Miguel's skills in order to help her. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tango Dino-Sits: When Tango is asked to babysit the dino mites, she underestimates how big the job will be. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Fast Friends: Blitz's patience is tested when he and Jon try to train a fast young raptor. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Long Way Home: Jon learns that shortcuts aren't always shorter when the Ranchers get lost in the badlands with the hungry Thunderfoot on their trail. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Trade in the Shade: When an uncooperative brontosaurus gets between the Jr Ranchers and their goal to harvest the apples from the orchard, the gang discovers the importance of others' needs. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Litterhorns: When Ike Tinhorn decides that it's easier to dispose of their garbage near Crystal Creek, it spoils the drinking water for dinosaurs downstream. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: One Very Special Bronto: When Clover tries to be the Ranch's protector like Biscuit, he fails to notice that a T-Rex needs his help. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unbearable Beach: On a nice summer's day Bear, as usual, goes fishing. But the fishing trip didn't quite work out: the forest dwellers made a "beach" at Bear's favourite spot. (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Genie: Molang and Piu Piu find a magic lamp. A genie appears and offers to grant them three wishes, but the two friends have very different wishes... (S5 Ep51)

programme.title: Mary Millington: Come Play With Me
programme.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.
